pages.text: Yiqian you su fu que yi jiang xuduo mingzheng zhaoshi nimen, dan nimen dui ta suo zhaoshi nimen de mingzheng, yiran zai yihuo zhong, zhidao ta siqu de shihou, nimen hai shuo:‘Zai ta zhihou, an la zaibu hui paiqian renhe shizhele.’ An la zheyang shi guofen de huaiyi zhe mi wu.”
